scripts.ex: echo "<html lang='ja'><head><meta charset='utf-8'/><title>example $N</title><body><script src='dist/$N.min.js'></script></body>" > example.html && webpack -w & webpack-dev-server
scripts.pr: node-sass src/style.scss dist/style.min.css --output-style compressed -w && webpack -w & webpack-dev-server
